Come venture around my playground of thoughts. Slide through my projects. Touch the textures, feel the intent and thought behind every bit, squish around the ideas. Jump into my ball pen and unleash your inner child.

I'm a SF transplant from Tampa, Florida. I find joy in exploring the outdoors, finding beauty in random third spaces on the internet, interactions where you're left with a shattered world view, small coffee shops with wood panels and craft lattes, a good book that you can't put down (link to blog about books I'm reading), and getting to know you!

I've worked at companies like PagerDuty, Amazon, Coda, and Delta airlines. I love small community environments where projects can be solved in a day and coffee chats are productive ways to build cross team collaborations. Some Projects I've worked on that I'm proud of: Adding Custom Domain to Coda Docs, a "Sign into Coda" Button, Weekly emails for Coda stats.
